newsitem.title: USA: Exel Ltd Q4 shr rises.
newsitem.headline: Exel Ltd Q4 shr rises.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)
NOTE: All per share numbers have been adjusted for a 100 pct stock dividend in July 1996.
1996 Q4 combined ratio was 92.5 percent compared to 95.3 percent in 1995. Combined ratio in 1996 was 93.6 percent compared to 94.0 percent in 1995.
1996 Q4 operating income, excluding realized investment results, was $75.1 million, or $0.85 a share compared with $72.9 million or $0.76 a share in 1995.
Full year operating income was $288.1 million or $3.14 a share compared with $283 million or $2.74 a share in 1995.

Net premiums written in the 1996 Q4 were $136.9 million compard with $197.781 million a year ago. Net premiums written for the full year 1996 were $597.1 million compared with $694.3 million a year ago.
